block.p: LEAD: * Bankers Trust Co., New York, a financial services company, named Paul Worthen Higgins senior vice president and head of international private banking at the Private Bank at Bankers Trust.
LEAD: * Bankers Trust Co., New York, a financial services company, named Paul Worthen Higgins senior vice president and head of international private banking at the Private Bank at Bankers Trust.
* Bankers Trust Co., New York, a financial services company, named Paul Worthen Higgins senior vice president and head of international private banking at the Private Bank at Bankers Trust.
* Cato Corp., Charlotte, N.C., an operator of women's specialty shops, appointed Linda McFarland Jenkins executive vice president for merchandise.
* Dainippon Ink and Chemicals Inc., Tokyo, nominated as a director Edward E. Barr, president and chief executive of its DIC Americas Inc. and Sun Chemical Corp. units.
* Mastercard International, New York, promoted Richard Woods to senior vice president for public affairs.

* Montgomery Ward & Co., Chicago, a specialty store retailing chain, appointed Dom Mangone president for hardlines merchandising and financial services, and Spencer Heine senior vice president for legal and real estate. Montgomery Ward also named William J. McCarthy president for marketing.
